channel.title: Biggest emote list you got?
channel.description: Anyone got a giant emote list I really need one.

item.title: Biggest emote list you got?
item.dc:creator: @illslayu illslayu
item.description:

i have one… (not made by me) i luv the 1110 (M4TR!X)

item.title: Biggest emote list you got?
item.dc:creator: @range_2her range 2her
item.description:
@range_2her wrote:

Anyone got a giant emote list I really need one.
